RawLine: TNPC_30043305,【師父教授的{color=#FF0000}幻波渾圓掌{/color}，以不同順序出招能達到不同的效果，等下按{color=#FF0000}ESC{/color}鍵進入招式介面看看說明吧！】,【师父教授的{color=#FF0000}幻波浑圆掌{/color}，以不同顺序出招能达到不同的效果，等下按{color=#FF0000}ESC{/color}键进入招式界面看看说明吧！】

Items.mt: <[>Sensei's teachings on the Mirage Wave Circular Palm, the different order of the moves can achieve different effects, press the ESC key to enter the move interface to see the explanation! <]>
